hero.title: Web3 Fashion Revolution
hero.subtitle: Discover exclusive Web3 branded clothing and merchandise. Connect your wallet, shop with crypto, and join the decentralized fashion revolution.
hero.tagline: Shop with crypto, own with pride

features.title: Why Choose Copoazú Labs?
features.subtitle: Experience the future of fashion with cutting-edge Web3 technology

securePrivate.title: Secure & Private
securePrivate.description: Your data stays safe with decentralized security

communityDriven.title: Community Driven
communityDriven.description: Join thousands of Web3 enthusiasts worldwide

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Explore our exclusive collection of Web3 branded clothing and accessories
products.featuredSubtitle: Discover our most popular Web3 merchandise
products.underDevelopment: Our products page is under development. Stay tuned for amazing Web3 merchandise!
products.moreProductsDescription: We're constantly adding new Web3 merchandise to our collection. Stay tuned for more amazing products!

web3Hoodie.name: Web3 Hoodie
web3Hoodie.description: Premium cotton-blend hoodie featuring our signature Web3 logo. Perfect for crypto enthusiasts who want to showcase their passion for decentralized technology. Features a comfortable fit, adjustable drawstring hood, and kangaroo pocket.

blockchainTShirt.name: Blockchain T-Shirt
blockchainTShirt.description: Soft, breathable cotton t-shirt with an innovative blockchain-inspired design. Made from 100% organic cotton, this shirt combines comfort with style. Perfect for developers, investors, and anyone passionate about blockchain technology.

cryptoCap.name: Crypto Cap
cryptoCap.description: High-quality adjustable cap featuring crypto-themed embroidery. Made with premium materials and featuring a structured crown with flat visor. Ideal for outdoor activities, trading sessions, or casual wear. One size fits most.

defiSweatshirt.name: DeFi Sweatshirt
defiSweatshirt.description: Cozy crewneck sweatshirt celebrating the DeFi revolution. Made from premium cotton fleece with a modern fit. Features subtle DeFi-themed graphics and our brand logo. Perfect for layering or wearing alone on cooler days.

nftHoodieCollection.name: NFT Hoodie Collection
nftHoodieCollection.description: Limited edition hoodie featuring unique NFT-inspired artwork. Each hoodie comes with a digital certificate of authenticity. Made from sustainable materials with attention to detail. A true collector's item for NFT enthusiasts.

smartContractTShirt.name: Smart Contract T-Shirt
smartContractTShirt.description: Technical t-shirt designed for developers and smart contract enthusiasts. Features code-inspired graphics and technical terminology. Made from moisture-wicking fabric perfect for coding marathons or casual tech meetups.

metaverseCap.name: Metaverse Cap
metaverseCap.description: Futuristic cap designed for the metaverse era. Features holographic elements and virtual world-inspired design. Made with cutting-edge materials and featuring LED accent lighting. Perfect for virtual reality sessions or futuristic fashion.

daoSweatshirt.name: DAO Sweatshirt
daoSweatshirt.description: Community-focused sweatshirt celebrating decentralized autonomous organizations. Features collaborative design elements and DAO governance symbols. Made from eco-friendly materials, reflecting the sustainable values of the DAO community.

collections.title: Collections
collections.subtitle: Discover curated collections of Web3 merchandise from top creators
collections.underDevelopment: Our collections page is under development. Stay tuned for curated Web3 merchandise collections!
collections.tryAdjustingFilters: Try adjusting your search or filter criteria

web3Essentials.name: Web3 Essentials
web3Essentials.description: A curated collection of fundamental Web3 merchandise for the modern crypto enthusiast. This collection features our most popular items including hoodies, t-shirts, and accessories that represent the core values of decentralized technology. Perfect for beginners entering the Web3 space or seasoned veterans who want to showcase their passion.
web3Essentials.shortDescription: Core pieces for the modern crypto enthusiast

defiFashion.name: DeFi Fashion
defiFashion.description: Celebrate the decentralized finance revolution with this exclusive collection. Featuring cutting-edge designs inspired by liquidity pools, yield farming, and decentralized exchanges. Each piece tells the story of financial freedom and innovation. Made with premium materials and sustainable practices.
defiFashion.shortDescription: Decentralized fashion for the decentralized world

nftCollectibles.name: NFT Collectibles
nftCollectibles.description: Unique digital fashion pieces that bridge the gap between physical and virtual worlds. This collection features limited edition items with digital certificates of authenticity. Each piece is inspired by popular NFT art movements and comes with exclusive digital collectibles. A true fusion of art, technology, and fashion.

cryptoStreetwear.name: Crypto Streetwear
cryptoStreetwear.description: Urban style meets blockchain technology in this dynamic collection. Inspired by the energy of crypto trading floors and blockchain conferences, these pieces combine street fashion with Web3 culture. Perfect for crypto meetups, blockchain events, or casual urban wear with a tech twist.

metaverseReady.name: Metaverse Ready
metaverseReady.description: Fashion designed for both virtual worlds and real life. This futuristic collection features items that work seamlessly in virtual reality environments while maintaining style in the physical world. With holographic elements and cutting-edge materials, these pieces prepare you for the metaverse era.
metaverseReady.shortDescription: Fashion for virtual worlds and real life

daoCommunity.name: DAO Community
daoCommunity.description: Clothing that celebrates decentralized autonomous organizations and community governance. This collection emphasizes collaboration, transparency, and collective decision-making. Each piece reflects the values of community-driven projects and features designs inspired by governance tokens and voting mechanisms.

about.title: About Copoazú Labs
about.subtitle: Leading the Web3 fashion revolution with innovative blockchain technology and sustainable practices
about.underDevelopment: Our about page is under development. Learn more about Copoazú Labs and our mission soon!

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To bridge the gap between traditional fashion and the decentralized future, creating exclusive merchandise that empowers the Web3 community. We believe in democratizing fashion through blockchain technology while maintaining the highest standards of sustainability and quality.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Pushing boundaries with cutting-edge blockchain technology and sustainable fashion practices that set new industry standards.

community.title: Community
community.description: Building a global network of Web3 enthusiasts who share our vision of decentralized, inclusive fashion.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: Committed to eco-friendly and ethical practices throughout our entire supply chain, from design to delivery.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: Open and honest in all our operations, providing full visibility into our processes and impact.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: The visionaries behind the Web3 fashion revolution
